subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[polished]] [[rice]]
# [[essence]]; [[energy]]
# [[spirit]]; [[energy]]; [[vigour]]
# [[seminal]] [[fluid]]; [[semen]]
# [[spirit]]; [[soul]]
# [[essence]]; [[concentrate]]
# [[demon]]; [[goblin]]
# {{lb|zh|dialectal|of meat}} [[lean]]
# [[fine]]; [[refined]]
# [[pure]]; [[unmixed]]
# [[concentrated]]; [[sincere]]
# [[clear]]; [[bright]]
# [[exquisite]]; [[profound]]
# [[extremely]]; [[very]]
#: {{zh-x|叫 雨 淋{lín} 了 個 精 溼}}
# to be [[proficient]]; to be [[expert]] at
# to [[expose]]; to be [[bare]]
# [[smart]]; [[clever]]
#: {{zh-x|你 以為{wéi} 你 能 玩兒{r} 得{de} 過 他？他 可 精 了。誰{shéi} 算計{ji} 誰{shéi} 還 不一定 呢！|You think you could defeat him? He is '''witted and alert'''. That who's going to set whom up is not certain yet!}}
# {{zh-alt-form|睛|tr=-|dot=}}
# {{zh-div|母}} {{lb|zh|phonology}} a [[Middle Chinese]] [[initial]] and the [['Phags-pa]] script letter [[ꡒ]] (dz-)

subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|せい|yomi=o}}

From {{der|ja|ltc|精|sort=せい|tr=t͡siᴇŋ|t=essence, energy}}. Compare modern {{cog|cmn|-}} reading ''jīng''.

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|せい}}

# [[polishing]], [[refining]]
# [[care]], [[conscientiousness]]
# something [[polished]] or [[refined]], particularly polished [[white rice]]
# [[vim]] and [[vigor]], [[energy]] in doing things
# [[life force]], [[vitality]], the energy of living
# one's [[emotion]]s, [[mind]], or [[soul]]
# the [[soul]] or [[spirit]] of a thing, particularly when [[appear]]ing on its own; a [[fairy]], a [[sprite]]
# [[semen]]

subSections.title: Synonyms
Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|しらげ|yomi=k}}

Noun stem of verb {{m|ja|精げる|tr=shirageru||to polish, to refine}}, itself derived from {{m|ja|白|tr=shira||white|pos=form used in compounds, usually ''shiro'' on its own}} + {{m|ja|ぐ|tr=gu|pos=verbalizing suffix}}, originally just meaning {{m|en|whiten|to whiten something}}.

subSections.title: Synonyms
